Pope Francis says war is in itself a crime against humanityPope Francis said on Sunday war was "a crime against humanity" as he reiterated a call for peace in Ukraine and the Middle East. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:32:20 GMT CM5DOHKXTJJ73NHKBWD2I32XCU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-says-war-is-itself-crime-against- humanity-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Top diplomats meet in Davos on Ukraine 'peace formula'Ukraine pushed ahead with its peace formula to end nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers from around the world at the World Economic Forum in Davos. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:13:55 GMT VH7SAKGHXBMLXCZMPMWP6PUE5M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/top-diplomats-meet-davos-ukraine-peace-formula-2024-01-14/Victoria Waldersee, Dmitry Zhdannikov世界欧洲
Egypt, China stress priority of safety, security of navigation in Red Sea in joint statementEgypt and China are closely following developments in the Red Sea, focusing on the priority of ensuring the safety and security of navigation, they said in a joint statement on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:37:11 GMT 6XGNZKKO75JQXAEFFDQ7PZ7M6M https://www.reuters.com/world/egypt-china-stress-priority-safety-security-navigation-red-sea-joint-statement-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
Mental strain, deepening risks as Israel's war with Hamas reaches 100 daysOne hundred days after Hamas gunmen broke out of Gaza to launch the deadliest attack in Israel's history, tens of thousands of Palestinians have been killed, Gaza lies in ruins and the Middle East is sliding towards a wider, more unpredictable conflict. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:35:11 GMT MSFQAXURO5KM7JG3QNFAHQEV64 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mental-strain-deepening-risks-israels-war-with-hamas-reaches-100-days-2024-01-14/James Mackenzie世界中东
Guatemala's Arevalo due to assume presidency with difficult path aheadGuatemalan President-elect Bernardo Arevalo is due to be sworn in Sunday for a four-year term, pledging to banish deep-rooted corruption, though he will come up against a divided Congress and string of judicial attempts to block him from wielding power. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:03:10 GMT B2VF2KTVJBOJRIFBB4LERIAEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/guatemalas-arevalo-due-assume-presidency-with-difficult-path-ahead-2024-01-14/Sofia Menchu世界美洲
Israelis wear dog tags in solidarity with hostages and each otherOn Israeli city streets and on television, in shops and in cafes, one symbol of solidarity with hostages held in Gaza has become ubiquitous in the 100 days since Hamas abducted them: military-style dog tags worn on neckchains. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 10:10:30 GMT YA7O73RHFROOZKWRNGO52NMRDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israelis-wear-dog-tags-solidarity-with-hostages-each-other-2024-01-14/Estelle Shirbon世界中东
Four migrants die trying to cross the ChannelFour migrants trying to cross the Channel to Britain died in French waters in the early hours of Sunday, a spokesperson for the local prefecture told Reuters. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 09:21:23 GMT 7ZO5L6GSENN5PENKBYYEAJM7WM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/four-migrants-die-trying-cross-channel-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian poet Lev Rubinstein dies at 76 -daughterLev Rubinstein, a Russian poet known for his conceptual art work subverting traditional Soviet era forms, died on Sunday, his daughter Maria said on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 08:49:16 GMT O2BU2MIKSVJPZIJNLA36ZCUTMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-poet-lev-rubinstein-dies-76-daughter-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Volcano erupts in Iceland, posing risk to fishing townA volcano erupted in southwest Iceland on Sunday, posing an immediate threat to a nearby small fishing town although it had been evacuated earlier and no people were in danger, authorities said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 08:17:15 GMT HUH6DJC52NL5LKT4IUBFI3NHLM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/volcano-erupts-southwest-iceland-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
China's diplomats condemn foreign governments over Taiwan post-election remarksChina's foreign ministry and embassies around the world this weekend warned countries against supporting Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and condemned foreign governments that congratulated the island's president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:56:59 GMT VFDBZ6AZOZLQFFBOGJKLRQ66HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-embassies-condemn-foreign-officials-over-taiwan-post-election-remarks-2024-01-14/Eduardo Baptista世界亚太地区
Indonesia's Marapi volcano erupts again, a month after deadly incidentIndonesia's Marapi volcano erupted on Sunday, with ash rising 1,300 metres (4,300 feet) from the peak six weeks month after a fatal eruption, according to the country's geological agency. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:08:56 GMT KGNY7NUAE5KWVEKZVOJ3BRGZIA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-marapi-volcano-erupts-again-month-after-deadly-incident-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
